name: Man is Greed
description:
The world is quickly taking a darker turn. People will die, blood will lay ways to the surface of the orange, gray earth. The world will burn under your feet as the people around you fear you. You are Boick, a man with a hidden story of ethics and one who doesn't care. You don't care, you control someone with no morals at all. Survive, thrive, and kill. 

This game is a prototype of what is to come and this will continue to grow with your feedback of course.
